ingredients: 7 lbs 4.8 oz - Premium Pale Malt (2 Row) US-Lot 30412 (1.9 SRM) (Grain)
1 lbs 12.0 oz - Instant Long Grain White Rice (1.0 SRM) (Grain)
1 lbs 2.1 oz - Anerobic 240 @ 4 hours Mason Malt (7.0 SRM) (Grain)
2.0 oz - Tettnang US / "German Label" (US Brewcraft) [4.7%] - First Wort (Hops)
2.0 oz - Hallertauer...German Hallertauer (AKA German Tradition) [3.2%] - Boil 5 min (Hops)
1.0 oz - Hallertauer...German Hallertauer (AKA German Tradition) [3.2%] - Steep 60 min (Hops)
name: Todd/Mark Pilsner-Secondary
